Header: “Range Bandara needs no money to crossover” – NFF
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Convening a media briefing National Organizer of the National Freedom Front, Jayantha Samaraweera expressed his views on the telephone conversations that Former Minister Range Bandara had revealed recently. He stated that there is no need to give Range Bandara money to crossover since he is a person who had waged war against Ranil Wickremesinghe from the beginning. Samaraweera continued to say that Range Bandara, himself was the one who wanted to break the government before all of this. He added that a government analyst will be sent to check on the authenticity of the telephone conversations.
